3.10 Primer.tables Tables

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard table suitable for tableling.

Example
LineupSort descending Last Activity Ideas
NVI Sprint 1, Batch 1 09/28/2018 - 10:40 5
VIDEO SERIES 1, What it looks like 10/16/2018 - 21:39 6
VIDEO SERIES 2, Expert Demos 10/24/2018 - 12:06 9
Sprint 1, Batch 2 10/23/2018 - 17:28 10
VIDEO SERIES 3, Animated 11/08/2018 - 18:18 7
Markup: tables/tables.twig 
<!-- <table class="responsive-enabled" data-striping="1"> -->

      </th>

    </tr>
